name: Hamster Happiness
description:
Hamster Happiness

You take care of a little hamster, who likes to spin around the wheel. You have a set of actions available and you need to make him happy. 

Will the hamster enjoy spinning around forever? How about giving him some food before spinning? Is he a cuddly hamster? Does he like to shower? Find out the answer to those and other questions in this small and cute about exploration. 

Explore all the ways to make the hamster happy!

Check out our indie game dev studio LogLog.Games
